amendments.title: An amendment to provide that notwithstanding section 8005 and 9003, of the unobligated funds authorized to be appropriated in FY 2016 and made available in this Act, $3.5 billion is available to transfer to the National Sea-Based Deterrence Fund.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Forbes amendment (A067) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to retire conventionally armed air launched cruise missiles.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Nugent amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for Pakistan.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Rohrabacher amendment (A065) Failed by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to deactivate the 440th airlift wing, or to move the personnel or aircraft of the 440th airlift wing, or to otherwise degrade the capabilities of the 440th airlift wing.
amendments.latest_major_action: Mr. Frelinghuysen raised a point of order against the Ellmers (NC) amendment (A064). Mr. Frelinghuysen stated that the Ellmers amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.

amendments.title: An amendment to provide for a limitation on the use of funds for Section 702 programs.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Massie amendment (A063) Agreed to by recorded vote: 255 - 174 (Roll no. 356). (consideration: CR H4224-4225)

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for BRAC.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Guinta amendment (A062) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in contravention of the authority of the President pursuant to Article II, section 2 of the Constitution.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A061) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to provide for defense counsel for any individual described in section 8101(c).
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 133 - 297 (Roll no. 355). (consideration: CR H4224)

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System include the term "Fair Labor Standards Act" and such disposition is listed as "willful" or "repeated".
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A059) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 242 (Roll no. 354). (consideration: CR H4223-4224)

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for compliance with various renewable energy mandates.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A058) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to consult as the term is used in reference to DOD and NSA, in contravention of the assurance provided under the National Institute of Standards and Technology Act.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A057) Failed by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds for Government Travel Charge Card expenses by military or civilian personnel of DOD for gaming, or entertainment that includes topless or nude entertainers or participants.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to enter into contracts with entities who are convicted of fraud.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to carry out furloughs of Working Capital Fund civilian employees.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Cole amendment (A054) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to transfer mine-resistant ambush protected vehicles.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 262 (Roll no. 353). (consideration: CR H4223)

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to provide arms, training, or other assistance to the Azov Battalion.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A052) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to procure any Army Aircrew Combat Uniforms.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A051) Failed by recorded vote: 51 - 378 (Roll no. 352). (consideration: CR H4222)

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to transfer flash-bang grenades.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 265 (Roll no. 351). (consideration: CR H4221-4222)

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to promulgate Directive 293, issued December 16, 2010, by the Office of Federal Contract Compliance Programs.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A040) Agreed to by voice vote.

amendments.title: An amendment to prohibit expenditure of funds by the Department of the Navy to divest or transfer, or prepare to divest or transfer, any search and rescue units from the Marine Corps.
amendments.latest_major_action: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A049) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 347 (Roll no. 350). (consideration: CR H4221)
